Keywords: Fantastic Four , Reporter , Scientist , Spider-Man Family
Real Name: Peter Parker
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Characters, Elevated, Hindering
A NEW KIND OF FANTASTIC TEAMWORK: When Spider-Man hits with a close attack, until your next turn other friendly characters with the Fantastic Four keyword can use Improved Movement: Characters, Elevated, Hindering.
THE NEW FANTASTIC FOUR: Passenger: 1, but only to carry characters with the Fantastic Four keyword. // Once per turn, when Spider-Man is carried and placed adjacent to 2+ opposing characters, after resolutions he may make a close attack.

Comments
February 19, 2021
Goop
He's ok, double target incap w/ running shot is always useful but there are many other figs that can do that for less than 75pts. He's an average figure by himself that combos better with the rest of the New FF (Wolverine, Hulk, Ghost Rider) that have the same trait.
January 25, 2021
Slade Wilson
while he may pale in comparison to the 60 point Spidey from SVAC set, don't write this one off. He brings the FF team ability to Spider-Man family teams and ignoring characters keeps him mobile. With the 2021 rules changes he may be even more worth it now.
September 7, 2020
